name: TrueSoul
description:
DOWNLOAD on playstore - ANDROID ::
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.TrueSoul

In a far far away land , there was a true lovers 'Maria' & 'Martin' .
But 'Maria' was a daughter of 'Hades' the lord of the underworld.
Before the begining of happy love story, 'Hades' took back his daughter 'Maria' forever.
Now, to bring her back, 'Martin' has to find a way to the underworld.
And the untold journy of true love begins...

- please comment below/ send me a feedback.
I will be more then happy to read..and extend this game further..
**Happy gaming**
